{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = Lucas Cross (Earth-616) from Vampires The Marvel Undead Vol 1 1 001.jpg | Name = Order of Tyrana | Aliases = | Leaders = | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = | Identity = Secret | Affiliation = | Allies = | Enemies = | Origin = Private Organization | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = | BaseOfOperations = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Marc Guggenheim | First = Blade Vol 4 1 | History = '''The Order of Tyrana''' is a secret organization specializing in matters of the occult - specifically vampires. At this time, very little is known about the Order save that they maintain a vested interest in the vampire hunter, [[Eric Brooks (Earth-616)|Blade]], and have compiled an extensive dossier on Blade's activities. One of the more important men associated with the Order is [[Lucas Cross (Earth-616)|Lucas Cross]], Blade's biological father. Lucas' role in the order has yet to be clearly defined.{{r|Blade Vol 4 1}} Recently, a prophecy has emerged directly relating to Lucas Cross and his Dhampir offspring. '''Prophecy:'''
::''A father in chains''
::''Freed by a son not yet birthed
::''Will Unlock Vlad's remains
::''Upon the salted Earth

::''After his vampire urge is sated
::''Upon drinking of virgin essence
::''His resistance now abated
::''Upon learning of father's presence

::''Returning essence lost
::''From those undead in graves
::''At immortal living's cost
::''To the man known as Blade''
| Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Mystical Organizations]] [[Category:Earth Religions]]
